com.github.harverst.roper.model

Interface Score<P>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicScore

    public interface Score<P>
    Scores are values composed of ScoreComponents. The template parameter, P, defines phases that can be used for ordering score components.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponent(ScoreComponent<P> component)
      Adds the provided component to this score.
      int getValue(PhaseOrder<P> ordering)
      Accesses the value of the score with all components applied.
      void removeComponent(ScoreComponent<P> component)
      Removes the component given it was previously added.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        int getValue(PhaseOrder<P> ordering)
        Accesses the value of the score with all components applied.
        Returns:
        the integer value of the score

      • addComponent

        void addComponent(ScoreComponent<P> component)
        Adds the provided component to this score.
        Parameters:
        mod - a component for this score

      • removeComponent

        void removeComponent(ScoreComponent<P> component)
        Removes the component given it was previously added.
        Parameters:
        mod - a component previously added to this score
